name: shuang
description: 帮助你快速上手双拼输入法

scripts.rename:minjs: mv build/app.bundle.js build/app.min.js && for i in build/**/*.js;do mv "$i" "${i%.js}.min.js";done
scripts.build:js: npx babel src/app.bundle.js -d build && npx babel src/scheme -d build/scheme
scripts.build:html: npx html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true index.src.html -o index.html
scripts.build:src: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:src && npm run rename:minjs
scripts.debug:src: npm run build:bundle && npm run debug:js && npm run debug:css && npm run debug:html
scripts.debug: npm run clear && npm run debug:src && npm run rename:minjs
